page.title: 01SHOTESHAM/HOWE GAZETEER
page.content:
1. Rural area, farming predominates. 2 Dormitory villages, low population. 3. Few facilities, Norwich 6 miles N. 4. Conservation areas, with commons. 5. Low unemployment.
The area is unspoilt and attractive. Gently undulating, it has many wooded areas with natural features such as fords and ponds.
Housing development over the years has been slight. A variety of styles and periods can be found.
Travel is necessary for schooling and most forms of employment, which makes personal transport more essential than in urban areas.
